meanings.definition: The point in the orbit of the moon or a satellite at which it is nearest to the earth.
meanings.sent1: During the perigees, the moon is closest to the earth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the perigees of satellites to understand their orbits better.
meanings.sent3: The perigees of the moon decided to have a picnic on Earth.
meanings.sent4: The perigees of the satellite whispered secrets to the stars.
meanings.sent5: The perigees of the moon shone brightly in the night sky.

meanings.definition: The point in the orbit of a planet or other celestial body at which it is nearest to the sun.
meanings.sent1: The perigees of Mercury bring it closest to the sun.
meanings.sent2: Astronomers observe the perigees of planets to study their orbits.
meanings.sent3: The perigees of the planets threw a party around the sun.
meanings.sent4: The perigees of the celestial bodies danced around the sun in a cosmic waltz.
meanings.sent5: The perigees of Venus glowed warmly in the solar system.
